content: The more farmland your planet can sustain, the smoother Yunguo's trials will go. Here are some <style=Highlight>cabbage seeds</style>, prepared especially for you. If you need anything else, just come see me anytime.
info: 星球树卷心菜种子-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A抱歉}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, wonderful news, hohoho... Yunguo has managed to grow yet another kind of crop — cabbage!
info: 星球树卷心菜种子-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3
